name: De Montfort University research repository
description: Discover research from De Montfort University. Supports multiple file formats including images, datasets, film, audio, code etc. DMU Figshare is a cloud-based data repository where research data can be deposited and shared.

data_themes.description: No explicit mapping to EU DCAT-AP themes on landing page.

geotopics.description: No explicit mapping to ISO19115 themes on landing page.
